content.raw:
This looks fine architecturally. I have commented on some style issues.

After fixing the below issues I will review again, and then you can merge this to the default branch.

Please make the additional test of concatenated segmentation from multiple files an item on Trello to be done between the merge and the next release of Segway.
content.html:
This looks fine architecturally. I have commented on some style issues.

After fixing the below issues I will review again, and then you can merge this to the default branch.

Please make the additional test of concatenated segmentation from multiple files an item on Trello to be done between the merge and the next release of Segway.
